title: Little Nightmares - Secrets of The Maw Chapter 1 + DLC
description:
Language: English, Russian
Release date:2017

System Requirements:
Operating system: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit)
Processor: Intel CPU Core i3
Memory: 4GB
Video card: Nvidia GTX 460 (DirectX: Version 11)
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX® 11
Free space on hard disk: 7.2 GB

Release info:
Based on the release of CODEX
Do not cut / Do not recoded
Game version: 1.0
Unlocked DLC:
Little Nightmares - Scarecrow Sack
Little Nightmares - Upside-down Teapot
Little Nightmares - Tengu Mask
Little Nightmares - DLC Mask
Little Nightmares - Secrets of The Maw Expansion Pass
»Installation time 2 minutes on HDD (depends on the computer)

Features:
Start an ominous adventure - remember your childhood fears in this gloomy bizarre fairy tale with a frightening atmosphere and a lot of unexpected situations.
Visit the Womb - look into the world Sixth, half sleep, half a nightmare, where each step is given as a leap, and every shadow seems impenetrable darkness!
Remember childhood pleasures - wake up a child in yourself, give free rein to the imagination and stay away from dangers. Each room is a cage, each of its inhabitants is a threat, and together it is a problem that you have to solve.

Installation:
Mount and install
Play
